hadiths.text: Fatima bint Qais reported:I had been married to a person from Banu Makhzum and he divorced me with irrevocable divorce. I sent a message to his family asking for maintenance allowance, and the rest of the hadith has been transmitted with a slight change of words

chapter.ara-name: باب الْمُطَلَّقَةُ ثَلاَثًا لاَ نَفَقَةَ لَهَا
chapter.eng-name: The woman who has been irrevocably divorced is not entitled to spending
